DOC.brief_summary: This multicenter single arm open label study . The primary objective evaluate safety effectiveness Lung Volume Reduction Coil ( LVRC ) treatment patient emphysema multiple center .
DOC.brief_title: Feasibility Study PneumRx 's Lung Volume Reduction Coil ( LVRC )
DOC.criteria: Greater equal 35 year age bilateral heterogenous emphysema Patient stop smoke minimum 8 week Read , understand sign Informed consent form Patient history recurrent significant respirator infection Patient inability walk > 140 meter Patient evidence disease may compromise survival lung cancer , renal failure , etc Patient pregnant lactating Patient clinical significant bronchiectasis Patient previous LVR surgery , lung transplant lobectomy Patient involve pulmonary drug study within 30 day prior study
